doc.summary: Gets whether the next added page will be the first page of an entry.
doc.text: Gets whether the next added page will be the first page of an entry.

doc.summary: Adds a new page from the given json data.
doc.text: Adds a new page from the given json data.

Adds a new floating anchor. A floating anchor is added to the next page that is added via <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/datagen/provider/patchouli/page/PageBuilder" method="addPage" type="(com.google.gson.JsonObject)void">#addPage(JsonObject)</ref>.  There may only ever be one floating anchor at a time and the next page after a floating anchor may not add an anchor itself.

doc.summary: Gets a string that should be used in the book for the given text.
doc.text: Gets a string that should be used in the book for the given text. Depending on the <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/datagen/provider/patchouli/BookProperties">properties</ref>, this  will either register a translation and return the translation key or will return the text itself.

doc.summary: Inserts an empty page, if necessary, so the next added page will have an even page number.
doc.text: Inserts an empty page, if necessary, so the next added page will have an even page number.

doc.summary: Checks that a given asset exists, Throws an exception if not.
doc.text: Checks that a given asset exists, Throws an exception if not.

doc.summary: An interface that defines methods, instances of <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/datagen/provider/patchouli/page/Content">Content</ref> can use to build book pages.
doc.text: An interface that defines methods, instances of <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/datagen/provider/patchouli/page/Content">Content</ref> can use to build book pages.
